architectural_notes: Theme palette: classic blue, turquoise, and gold

existing_features.title: Update the global theme color tokens to a classic palette of blue (primary), turquoise (secondary), and gold (accent) using the existing CSS variable (OKLCH) theme system so Tailwind/Shadcn theme utilities automatically inherit the new colors in both light and dark modes.

Replace any hardcoded mint/emerald/green/gray/white color utilities in site sections and navigation with theme token-based classes (e.g., bg-background, text-foreground, text-primary, bg-secondary, text-accent-foreground, border-border) so the updated blue/turquoise/gold theme is applied consistently across the app.

new_feature_requests.summary: Set app theme color palette to classic blue, turquoise, and gold

projectName: Update site theme to classic blue, turquoise, and gold
